name: Puzzle, Assemble!
description:
This is a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2021!

It's a short 5-level puzzle speed-game about making helping squares to meet up! However, when you press the arrow keys, ALL of the squares (except the gray ones) move in unison.

I wasn't sure if I was going to join this game jam since I was... ahem... busy this weekend. Instead of 48 hours, I made a game in 10 hours. Within those 10 hours I encountered a LOOOT of problems which I may bring up in a Youtube video I may or may not create on the channel AwSomeone. I have made other games and videos, so check out my profile or yt-channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXEYAB_BcQXNcGiQewy5pog
